name: Pika Labs
about: An AI-powered video generator that transforms text prompts into short, cinematic video clips.
summary: Create cinematic video clips from text in seconds.
details: Pika Labs enables creators to produce short videos directly from text descriptions. It supports editing, character motion, and camera control.
howTo: Log into Pika Labs and start a new project.
Type a prompt like 'a spaceship flying through neon clouds'.
Preview and tweak the generated video clip.
Export your video for sharing or further editing.
